page.title: 16Tourism
page.content: Tourists seem to like to come to our part of the country in the summer which makes it hard for us to get from one place to another as we live in a rural area. There is also a lot of beaches which are crammed packed with people. If you wanted to go to Barnstaple in the summer there is always a queue on the mainroad. We have holiday camps at Ruda , Putsborough and Croyde Bay. A lot of people in the summer have Bed & Breakfast and then many of the hotels start to get packed with tourists. In Georgeham there are two pubs ,the Rock Inn is the one that tourists go to and the Kings Arms locals mostly go to. Favourite tourist spots are Putsborough , Saunton and Croyde Beaches.
